name: In Limbo
description: Surrealistrasyon//Şerif Gümüşbaş//Watercolor//2000x2500pixel//Despite what I feel when I look at this world, I know that a better world is possible ...//I have been drawing for years as a result of my interest in drawing since my childhood. And I am 32 years old. In this period of time, the automatism method I discovered over time has been the best tool for describing myself and the world I experience.
